contexts.name: balance_and_usage
contexts.description: Account balance, data usage, talk time, call history, and current plan for this customer.

schema.description: Data remaining in current period (e.g. daily cap or monthly)
How much data has been used in the period
Recent call history or summary (e.g. last 5 calls)

example_queries: How much data have I used?
How much did I talk this month?

contexts.name: loans
contexts.description: Loan and advance-related information: device loans, bill advances, eligibility, outstanding amount.

schema.description: Whether customer has an active loan (true/false)
Type of loan (e.g. device loan, bill advance)
Outstanding loan amount to be repaid
Total tenure of loan in months
Whether customer is eligible for advance/loan

example_queries: What is my outstanding loan amount?
When is my next EMI due?
Am I eligible for a bill advance?
How much is my device EMI?
